Test network speed between two servers

  1. Install netcat on both servers nc
  2. From one of them
    nc -vvlnp 12345 >/dev/null
  3. Goto the other and perform
    dd if=/dev/zero bs=4M count=1K | nc -v 10.0.48.56 12345

    You should see something like this 

    [root@xaerap04 ~]# dd if=/dev/zero bs=4M count=1K | nc -v 10.0.48.56 12345
Ncat: Version 6.40 ( http://nmap.org/ncat )
Ncat: Connected to 10.0.48.56:12345.
1024+0 records in
1024+0 records out
4294967296 bytes (4.3 GB) copied, 4.15641 s, 1.0 GB/s
Ncat: 4294967296 bytes sent, 0 bytes received in 4.16 seconds.
